There is not much to see here, yet.

Install

pip install tc_fastai_examples

How to use

This is a very sophisticated piece of software:

{% raw %} 
hello()

Hello, world!
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
hello(who='fast.ai')

Hello, fast.ai!
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
hello(greeting='Welcome', who='everybody')

Welcome, everybody!
{% endraw %}
